alert.note: Alert for Colorado Springs Vicinity, Southern El Paso County, Rampart Range Below 7400 Ft; Crowley County; Eastern Las Animas County; La Junta Vicinity, Otero County; Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet; Trinidad Vicinity, Western Las Animas County Below 7500 Ft; Walsenburg Vicinity, Upper Huerfano River Basin Below 7500 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 15 at 12:29AM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...Patchy Dense Fog Early This Morning... Areas of fog situated just south of Colorado Spring down through the I-25 corridor and to the Colorado and New Mexico border, will continue to erode from north to south through the early morning hours. Before completely eroding, patchy dense fog with visibility to around one quarter mile will be likely. Additionally, can`t rule out some patchy slick spots mainly on bridges and elevated surfaces. Those traveling across southern Colorado this morning should be prepared for widely varying visibility and possible slick conditions.
